item.name: F19 to F19
item.appendix: F19 to Hyper(ctrl+shift+cmd+opt) + F19 Only, send escape
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::ESCAPE

item.name: Hyper+Tab To Capslock
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK

item.name: Command+Circumflex sends Command+Shift+Backquote
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::GERMAN_CIRCUMFLEX, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::EQUAL, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Change HJKL keys to arrow keys in Finder and OmniOutliner
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT

item.name: Finder Shortcuts
item.appendix: wq to move to tab right/left
O to navigate one level down or to open file
backspace to navigate one level up
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::W, KeyCode::TAB | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Q, KeyCode::TAB | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::X, KeyCode::W | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::DELETE, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::O, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Hyper Shortcuts
item.appendix: Hyper(ctrl+shift+cmd+opt) + N or P, send backwards-word/forward-word
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::DELETE, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::FORWARD_DELETE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::O, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::DELETE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::P, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::N, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::KEY_8, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::KEY_5, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::KEY_6, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::RETURN
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SLASH, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::KEY_7, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Disable Sysdiagnose Keys
item.appendix: Disable sysdiagnose dot, comma and forward slash key

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SLASH, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE

item.name: Hyper+HJKL to Left-Down-Up-Right
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT
